original_title: Whitesnake: Live in the still of the night
overview: Recorded live on October 20, 2004  at London's Hammersmith Apollo, this explosive show features all of Whitesnake’s greatest hits plus many fan favorites. The DVD captures the excitement and vitality of the band’s performance before an adoring all-ages crowd who sing along to every song. Songs: 01. Burn  02. Bad Boys  03. Love Ain't No Stranger  04. Ready an' Willing  05. Is This Love  06. Give Me All Your Love  07. Judgment Day  08. Blues for Mylene  09. Snake Dance  10. Crying in the Rain  11. Drum Solo  12. Crying in the Rain  13. Ain't No Love in the Heart of the City  14. Don't Break My Heart Again  15. Fool for Your Loving  16. Here I Go Again  17. Take Me with You  18. Still of the Night.
title: Whitesnake: Live in the Still of the Night
